Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time between Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR and Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Average time it takes Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR after Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time between Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR and Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in cases of re-submission
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average waiting time to the Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time for Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR to be followed by Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in case of re-submission
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in cases where it is eventually approved
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR in the process flow leading to Payment Handled
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time for Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR in processes that involve Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER before rejection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time it takes from Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR to the next Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time between Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR and Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to identify process bottlenecks
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time from Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR to Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE as a measure of preparation for re-submission
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'
